name: Dragxel
description:
A pixel drag racing game inspired by older arcade platforms such as the Atari 2600.

This was made in the span of a few weeks.

Has 24 total races, all are possible to beat even if they seem difficult.

!!!PROGRESS DOES NOT SAVE!!!

This is meant to be played in one sitting.

Basic Controls:

Arrow Keys : Move around UI

Left/Right : Add or remove points/Change Car/Navigate Opponent menu

Enter : Start, Spam to drive car

All Music was created by myself, as well as art assets, and other such things.
